CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(RW_Loan_Record_Status__c, 'First Disbursement Received') , RW_First_Disbursement_Date__c - RW_NOC_Generated_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(RW_Loan_Record_Status__c, 'NOC Generated'), TODAY() - RW_NOC_Generated_Date__c, 0 ))
CustomField.label: Loan First Disbursement Pending Days
